options(knitr.kable.NA = 'N/A')

```{r moive_list, echo=F, message=F, warning=F, results = 'asis'}
output_col_names <- c(
    'IMDB ID',
    'DOUBAN ID',
    '名称',
    '导演',
    '主演',
    'IMDB 评分',
    '豆瓣评分',
    '打个分'
)

movie_list <- read_tsv(
    '../data/cn/movie-list.tsv',
    col_types = 'cccccccccDDddd', na = c('', 'NA', 'N/A'))

movie_table <- function(movies) {
    which_year <- movies[1, ]$release_year
    which_year <- gen_which_year(which_year)
    header_ <- paste0('<h2>', which_year, '</h2>')
    table_ <- movies %>%
        arrange(desc(release_date), directors, name_zh) %>%
        select(c('imdb_id_html', 'douban_id_html', 'linked_name', 'directors',
                 'casts', 'imdb_rating_html', 'douban_rating_html', 'stars')) %>%
        setNames(output_col_names) %>%
        kable("html", escape = F, table.attr = 'class="movie-table"') %>%
        kable_styling(bootstrap_options = 'striped') %>%
        row_spec(0, align = 'right') %>%
        column_spec(1:2, extra_css = 'display: none;', include_thead = T) %>%
        column_spec(6, width = '3em') %>%
        column_spec(7, width = '3em') %>%
        column_spec(8, width = '7em')
    footer_ <- '<br/>'
    
    tibble(table_ = paste0(header_, table_, footer_))
}

movie_list %>%
    mutate(
        stars = gen_stars_html(rating),
        release_year = year(release_date),
        imdb_id_html = gen_imdb_id_html(imdb_id),
        douban_id_html = gen_douban_id_html(douban_id),
        linked_name = gen_linked_text_html(name_zh, blog_link),
        imdb_rating_html = gen_imdb_rating_html(imdb_rating, imdb_id),
        douban_rating_html = gen_douban_rating_html(douban_rating, douban_id)) %>%
    ddply(.(release_year), movie_table) %>%
    arrange(desc(release_year)) %>%
    select(table_) %>%
    unlist %>%
    cat
```

```{r update_movie_info, eval=F, include=F}
movie_list_ <- movie_list %>%
    select(-c('name_zh', 'name', 'directors', 'casts', 'countries', 'genres',
              'imdb_rating', 'douban_rating')) %>%
    mutate(imdb_rating = get_imdb_rating(imdb_id)) %>%
    mutate(douban_info = map(douban_id, get_douban_info)) %>%
    unnest(douban_info)

movie_list_ %>%
    select(c('imdb_id', 'douban_id', 'blog_link', 'name_zh', 'name',
             'directors', 'casts', 'countries', 'genres', 'release_date',
             'watch_date', 'imdb_rating', 'douban_rating', 'rating')) %>%
    write_tsv('../data/cn/movie-list.tsv')
```
